title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.11.3 发布
author: 电量量
txt_content:
本帖最后由 dianliang 于 2019-5-18 18:45 编辑 

Minecraft 基岩版是指包括Minecraft 手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS）在内，使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft统一版本。
正式版是Minecraft 基岩版经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addon和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商店也会推送此次更新。

Minecraft 基岩版 1.11.3 发布

NOTE: This hotfix is not available on Nintendo Switch as we are still working on addressing several crash issues for a future update. Multiplayer is still compatible with versions 1.11.0 through 1.11.3
注意：此热修复在Nintendo Switch上不可用，我们正在为未来的更新修复几个崩溃漏洞。多人游戏在1.11.0到1.11.3仍然兼容。

修复：


Fixed a crash that could occur when mobs found the nearest attackable mob
修复了一个在生物找到最接近且可供攻击的生物时的崩溃
When converting from V1 to V2, villagers now keep their XP level
在从V1升级至V2时，村民现在会保留他们的经验等级
Villagers cured of zombification can no longer change their profession if they have enough XP (MCPE-42348)
村民在变为僵尸时如果经验足够，不会再转换职业
Another fix for villagers changing their professions when they're not supposed to
修复了村民在他们不需要时转换职业的漏洞
Fixed pathfinding so when an entity can't float, swim, or be amphibious, it can still walk at the bottom of water
修复了寻路系统，现在实体不会漂浮、游泳或者水陆两栖，但他们仍可以在水底走路
Fixed gamertags and gamerpics of Realms members not appearing on the members list
修复了不在Realms成员名单中的玩家的代号和照片
The Realms members list no longer returns to the first page when navigating to another page
Realm成员名单现在不会在翻页时切换到第一页
When using commands, the villager and zombie_villager target selectors now target both V1 and V2 mob types
使用指令时，villager和zombie_villager目标现在同时标志着V1和V2两种生物类型。



正版地址Google Playhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Storehttps://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/minecraft-for-windows-10/9nblggh2jhxj
